entry.title: 场论
entry.content:
φ=φ(r,t)=φ(x,y,z,t)a=a(r,t)=a(x,y,z,t)\varphi=\varphi(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\varphi(x,y,z,t)\\\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\boldsymbol{a}(x,y,z,t)φ=φ(r,t)=φ(x,y,z,t)a=a(r,t)=a(x,y,z,t)

定常场:场内函数值不依赖于时间，即不随时间t变化:

φ=φ(r)a=a(r)\varphi=\varphi(\boldsymbol{r}) \quad\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(\boldsymbol{r})φ=φ(r)a=a(r)

均匀场:同一时刻场内各点函数值都相等:

φ=φ(t)a=a(t)\varphi=\varphi(t)\quad\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(t)φ=φ(t)a=a(t)

复数

加法与乘积

复数相关定义：

  • 有序实数对z=(x,y)称为复数
  • x称为z的实部，y称为z的虚部，
  • 记作x=Re z ,y=Im z

实数xxx可以看作复数(x,0)(x,0)(x,0)

若有两个复数zz=x1,y1z_{z}={x_{1},y_{1}}zz​=x1​,y1​和z2=(x2,y2)z_{2}=(x_{2},y_{2})z2​=(x2​,y2​)
满足zz=z2z_{z}=z_{2}zz​=z2​
当且仅当x1=x2y1=y2x_{1}=x_{2} \quad y_{1}=y_{2}x1​=x2​y1​=y2​

定义:复数加法:

(x1,y1)+(x2,y2)=((x1+x2),(y1+y2))(x_{1},y_{1})+(x_{2},y_{2})=((x_{1}+x_{2}),(y_{1}+y_{2}))(x1​,y1​)+(x2​,y2​)=((x1​+x2​),(y1​+y2​))

定义:复数乘法:

(x1,y1)(x2,y2)=((x1x2−y1y2),(y1x2+x1y2))(x_{1},y_{1})(x_{2},y_{2})=((x_{1}x_{2}-y_{1}y_{2}),(y_{1}x_{2}+x_{1}y_{2}))(x1​,y1​)(x2​,y2​)=((x1​x2​−y1​y2​),(y1​x2​+x1​y2​))

根据上述定义，

  • 当范围限制于实数时，上述定义符合实数运算法则:

(x1,0)+(x2,0)=(x1+x2,0)(x1,0)(x2,0)=(x1x2,0)(x_{1},0)+(x_{2},0)=(x_{1}+x_{2},0)\\(x_{1},0)(x_{2},0)=(x_{1}x_{2},0)(x1​,0)+(x2​,0)=(x1​+x2​,0)(x1​,0)(x2​,0)=(x1​x2​,0)

  • (0,1)(y,0)=(0,y)(0,1)(y,0)=(0,y)(0,1)(y,0)=(0,y),
    因此可知任何实数(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)
    由此可得两个特殊复数(1,0)(1,0)(1,0)和(0,1)(0,1)(0,1)

  • 记i=(0,1)i=(0,1)i=(0,1),故任意z=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iyz=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iyz=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iy
    且i2=(−1,0)=−1i^{2}=(-1,0)=-1i2=(−1,0)=−1

基本代数性质

交换律:

z1+z2=z2+z1z1z2=z2z1z_{1}+z_{2}=z_{2}+z_{1}\\z_{1}z_{2}=z_{2}z_{1}z1​+z2​=z2​+z1​z1​z2​=z2​z1​

结合律:

(z1+z2)+z3=z1+(z2+z3)(z_{1}+z_{2})+z_{3}=z_{1}+(z_{2}+z_{3})(z1​+z2​)+z3​=z1​+(z2​+z3​)

分配律:

z(z1+z2)=zz1+zz2z(z_{1}+z_{2})=zz_{1}+zz_{2}z(z1​+z2​)=zz1​+zz2​

交换律和结合律和分配律自然可以从实数的交换律和结合律和分配律推导而来
例如:

z1+z2=(x1+x2,y1+y2)=(x2+x1,y2+y1)=z2+z1z_{1}+z_{2}=(x_{1}+x_{2},y_{1}+y_{2})=(x_{2}+x_{1},y_{2}+y_{1})=z_{2}+z_{1}z1​+z2​=(x1​+x2​,y1​+y2​)=(x2​+x1​,y2​+y1​)=z2​+z1​

实数的加法单位元(0,0)(0,0)(0,0)和乘法单位元(1,0)(1,0)(1,0)完全可以转移到复数来

z+0=zz⋅1=z\begin{aligned}z+0&=z\\z \cdot 1&=z \end{aligned}z+0z⋅1​=z=z​

  • 此外，0和1是唯一满足此性质的复数

  • 对于每一个复数zzz有唯一的负元(−z)(-z)(−z),满足z+(−z)=0z+(-z)=0z+(−z)=0

z+(−z)=0(x,y)+(u,v)=0(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0）x+u=0y+v=0u=−xv=−y \begin{aligned} &z+(-z)=0 \\ &(x,y)+(u,v)=0 \\ &(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0） \\ &x+u=0 \quad y+v=0 \\ &u=-x \quad v=-y &\end{aligned}​z+(−z)=0(x,y)+(u,v)=0(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0）x+u=0y+v=0u=−xv=−y​​

定义减法:

z1−z2=z1+(−z2)z_{1}-z_{2}=z_{1}+(-z_{2})z1​−z2​=z1​+(−z2​)

故

z1−z2=(x1−x2,y1−y2)z_{1}-z_{2}=(x_{1}-x_{2},y_{1}-y_{2})z1​−z2​=(x1​−x2​,y1​−y2​)

对于任意非零复数(x,y)(x,y)(x,y),存在一个复数z−1z^{-1}z−1满足zz−1=1zz^{-1}=1zz−1=1

设

(x,y)(u,v)=1(x,y)(u,v)=1(x,y)(u,v)=1

可得:

xu−yv=1yu+xv=0xu-yv=1\\yu+xv=0xu−yv=1yu+xv=0

可以计算得到唯一解

u=xx2+y2v=−yx2+y2u = \frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}}\quadv = \frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}}u=x2+y2x​v=x2+y2−y​

因此可知，非零复数z=(x,y)z=(x,y)z=(x,y)的乘法逆元是

z−1=(xx2+y2,−yx2+y2)z^{-1}=(\frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z−1=(x2+y2x​,x2+y2−y​)

其它性质

若

z1z2=0z_{1}z_{2}=0z1​z2​=0

则因子z1z_{1}z1​和z2z_{2}z2​中至少有一个零

假设z1z2=0z_{1}z_{2}=0z1​z2​=0
逆元z1−1z_{1}^{-1}z1−1​存在(即假设z1z_{1}z1​不等于0)

z2=1⋅z2=(z1−1z1)z2=z1−1(z1z2)=z1−1⋅0=0z_{2}=1 \cdot z_{2}=(z_{1}^{-1}z_{1})z_{2}=z_{1}^{-1}(z_{1}z_{2})=z_{1}^{-1} \cdot 0=0z2​=1⋅z2​=(z1−1​z1​)z2​=z1−1​(z1​z2​)=z1−1​⋅0=0

定义除法

z1z2=z1z2−1\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=z_{1}z_{2}^{-1}z2​z1​​=z1​z2−1​

且由上文已知

z−1=(xx2+y2,−yx2+y2)z^{-1}=(\frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z−1=(x2+y2x​,x2+y2−y​)

故

z1z2=(x1x2+y1y2x2+y2,y1x2−x1y2x2+y2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=(\frac{x_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{y_{1}x_{2}-x_{1}y_{2}}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z2​z1​​=(x2+y2x1​x2​+y1​y2​​,x2+y2y1​x2​−x1​y2​​)

可以通过

z1z2=(x1+iy1)(x2−iy2)(x2+iy2)(x2−iy2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=\frac{(x_{1}+iy_{1})(x_{2}-iy_{2})}{(x_{2}+iy_{2})(x_{2}-iy_{2})}z2​z1​​=(x2​+iy2​)(x2​−iy2​)(x1​+iy1​)(x2​−iy2​)​

根据商的定义

z1+z2z3=(z1+z2)z3−1=z1z3−1+z2z3−1=z1z3+z1z3\frac{z_{1}+z_{2}}{z_{3}}=(z_{1}+z_{2})z_{3}^{-1}=z_{1}z_{3}^{-1}+z_{2}z_{3}^{-1}=\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}}+\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}}z3​z1​+z2​​=(z1​+z2​)z3−1​=z1​z3−1​+z2​z3−1​=z3​z1​​+z3​z1​​

取z1=1z_{1}=1z1​=1

1z2=1⋅z2−1=z2−1\frac{1}{z_{2}}=1 \cdot z_{2}^{-1}=z_{2}^{-1}z2​1​=1⋅z2−1​=z2−1​

故z1z2=z1z2−1=z1(1z2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=z_{1}z_{2}^{-1}=z_{1}(\frac{1}{z_{2}})z2​z1​​=z1​z2−1​=z1​(z2​1​)

同样，还有额外易证性质

(z1z2)(z1−1zz2−1)=(z1z1−1)(z2z2−1)=1(z1≠0z2≠0)(z_{1}z_{2})(z_{1}^{-1}z_{z_{2}}^{-1})=(z_{1}z_{1}^{-1})(z_{2}z_{2}^{-1})=1 \quad(z_{1} \ne 0 \quad z_{2} \ne 0)(z1​z2​)(z1−1​zz2​−1​)=(z1​z1−1​)(z2​z2−1​)=1(z1​=0z2​=0)

1z1z2=(z1z2)−1=z1−1z2−1=(1z1)(1z2)(z1≠0z2≠0)\frac{1}{z_{1}z_{2}}=(z_{1}z_{2})^{-1}=z_{1}^{-1}z_{2}^{-1}=(\frac{1}{z_{1}})(\frac{1}{z_{2}})\quad(z_{1} \ne 0 \quad z_{2} \ne 0)z1​z2​1​=(z1​z2​)−1=z1−1​z2−1​=(z1​1​)(z2​1​)(z1​=0z2​=0)

z1z2z3z4=(z1z3)(z2z4)(z3≠0z4≠0)\frac{z_{1}z_{2}}{z_{3}z_{4}}=(\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}})(\frac{z_{2}}{z_{4}})\quad(z_{3} \ne 0 \quad z_{4} \ne 0)z3​z4​z1​z2​​=(z3​z1​​)(z4​z2​​)(z3​=0z4​=0)

entry.title: plane rti
entry.content:
平面和球不稳定性简论

平面

控制方程和边界条件

假设流体层上下均为无旋流：

u⃗=∇ Φ\vec{u} = abla\ \Phiu=∇ Φ

Φ={Φ1Φ2\Phi = egin{cases}\Phi_1\\Phi_2\end{cases}Φ={Φ1​Φ2​​

z=ζ(x,y,t)z = \zeta(x,y,t)z=ζ(x,y,t)

首先由连续性方程有：

1ρDρDt+∇⋅u⃗=0 rac{1}{ ho} rac{D ho}{Dt} + abla \cdot \vec{u} = 0ρ1​DtDρ​+∇⋅u=0

因为不可压缩：

DρDt=0 rac{D ho}{Dt} = 0DtDρ​=0

因此有：

∇⋅u⃗=0Δ Φ1=0Δ Φ2=0 egin{alignat*}{3} abla \cdot \vec{u} &= 0\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{1}&= 0\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{2} &= 0\end{alignat*}∇⋅uΔ Φ1​Δ Φ2​​=0=0=0​

边界条件

周期性边界条件，默认 x 和 y 方向为周期性边界。
初始扰动可以假设发生在有限区域内，因此在所有时间里，扰动都是有界的（有限的）。
当

z→±∞，∇ Φ→Uz o \pm \infty ， abla\ \Phi ightarrow Uz→±∞，∇ Φ→U

界面条件

界面上的流体粒子必须与界面一起移动：意味界面是连续的，没有滑移或分离。流体粒子始终保持在界面上。

两种流体不能在同一时间占据同一点，并且两种流体之间不能形成空腔：确保流体的物理完整性。流体不能相互穿透，并且界面必须保持连续，没有空隙。

界面法向速度=流体法向速度：

∂Φi∂z=∂Φi∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y}∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂Φi​​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​

压力在交界面上连续：

由伯努利方程:

∂Φi∂t+12(∇Φi)2−piρi+gz=Ci rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + rac{1}{2} \left( abla\Phi_{i} ight)^{2} - rac{p_{i}}{ ho_{i}} + gz = C_{i}∂t∂Φi​​+21​(∇Φi​)2−ρi​pi​​+gz=Ci​

有：

ρ1{C1−12(∇Φ1)2−∂Φ1∂t−gz}=ρ2{C2−12(∇Φ2)2−∂Φ2∂t−gz}(z=ζ) ho_{1}\{ C_{1} - rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{1})}^{2} - rac{\partial\Phi_{1}}{\partial t} - gz\} = ho_{2}\{ C_{2} - rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} - gz\}\quad(z=ζ)ρ1​{C1​−21​(∇Φ1​)2−∂t∂Φ1​​−gz}=ρ2​{C2​−21​(∇Φ2​)2−∂t∂Φ2​​−gz}(z=ζ)

初始时分无扰动：

ρ1{C1−12U12}=ρ2{C2−12U22}(z=0){ ho}_{1} \left\{ C_{1} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} ight\} = ho_{2}\left\{ C_{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} ight\}\quad(z=0)ρ1​{C1​−21​U1​2}=ρ2​{C2​−21​U2​2}(z=0)

两式相减：

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz} ho_{1}\{ rac{1}{2} \left( abla \Phi_{1} ight)^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz\} = ho_{2}\{ rac{1}{2} {( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{1}{2} {U_{2}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\}ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

完全耦合方程变为：

ΔΦ1=0，ΔΦ2=0\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{1} = 0，\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{2} = 0ΔΦ1​=0，ΔΦ2​=0

当

z→±∞,∇ Φ→0z o \pm \infty , abla\ \Phi o 0 z→±∞,∇ Φ→0

∂Φi∂z=∂ζ∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y(z=ζ，i=1,2) rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y}\quad(z = \zeta ，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂ζ​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​(z=ζ，i=1,2)

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz} ho_{1} \{ rac{1}{2} ( abla \Phi_{1} )^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz \} = ho_{2}\{ rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} + rac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\}ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

线化方程

Φ1=U1x+Φ1′(z>ζ),Φ2=U2x+Φ2′(z<ζ){\Phi_{1} = U_{1}x + \Phi}_{1}^{'}(z > \zeta),\Phi_{2}{= U_{2}x + \Phi}_{2}^{'}(z < \zeta)Φ1​=U1​x+Φ1′​(z>ζ),Φ2​=U2​x+Φ2′​(z<ζ)

当交界面位移和斜率都很小，将方程线性化得到:

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0)Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′​=0(z<0)

ifz→±∞，∇ Φ′→0\quad z o \pm \infty ， abla\ \Phi^{'} o 0z→±∞，∇ Φ′→0

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2) rac{\partial {\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} \quad(z = 0，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

ρ1U1∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0) ho_{1}{U}_{1} rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = ho_{2}\left( U_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta ight)\quad(z = 0)ρ1​U1​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

任意的扰动都可以分解成以下形式的独立模式：

(ζ，Φ1′，Φ2′)=(ζ^，Φ^1，Φ^2)ei(kx+ly)+st\left( \zeta ，{\Phi_{1}}^{'}，{\Phi_{2}}^{'} ight) = (\widehat{\zeta}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2})e^{i(kx + ly) + st}(ζ，Φ1​′，Φ2​′)=(ζ​，Φ1​，Φ2​)ei(kx+ly)+st

代入方程：

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0)Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′​=0(z<0)

可以得到：

d2Φ^1dz2−l2Φ^1−k2Φ^1=0 rac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = 0dz2d2Φ1​​−l2Φ1​−k2Φ1​=0

d2Φ^2dz2−l2Φ^2−k2Φ^2=0 rac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = 0dz2d2Φ2​​−l2Φ2​−k2Φ2​=0

可以解得：

Φ^2=A2e−k~z+B2ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z} + B_{2}e^{\widetilde{k}z}Φ2​=A2​e−kz+B2​ekz

Φ^1=A1ek~z+B1e−k~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z} + B_{1}e^{- \widetilde{k}z}Φ1​=A1​ekz+B1​e−kz

其中k~=(k2+l2)1/2\widetilde{k} = {(k^{2} + l^{2})}^{1/2}k=(k2+l2)1/2

再利用边界条件：当z→±∞z o \pm \inftyz→±∞时，∇ Φ′→0 abla\ \Phi^{'} o 0∇ Φ′→0

Φ^2=A2e−k~z，Φ^1=A1ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z}Φ2​=A2​e−kz，Φ1​=A1​ekz

再根据

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2) rac{\partial{\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial\zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i} rac{\partial\zeta}{\partial x}\quad(z = 0，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

可以解得

A2=−(s+ikU2)ζ^/k~A1=(s+ikU1)ζ^/k~2 egin{alignat*}{2} A_{2} &= - (s + ikU_{2}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k} \ A_{1} &= (s + ikU_{1}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k}\end{alignat*}{2}A2​A1​​=−(s+ikU2​)ζ​/k=(s+ikU1​)ζ​/k​2

根据方程

ρ1(U2∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0) ho_{1}{(U}_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = ho_{2}\left( U_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta ight)\quad(z = 0)ρ1​(U2​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

得到特征值关系：

在球坐标系(r,θ,φ)中,交界面位于r=R处：
